name: ACM--2019 3rd International Conference on Digital Signal Processing (ICDSP 2019)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: Publication: All papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). == Submission Methods: Full Paper(publication and oral presentation) Abstract(oral presentation only) Electronic Submission System (.pdf) http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icdsp2019
